name: Barrow Brawlers
description:
Explore the dark barrow of your ancestors' fabled ax in this multiplayer adventure. Search for three keys to unlock the magical tomb and escape the barrow.  Play as one of two unique characters as you fight your way through the cursed skulls of the long deed

Play as the Viking Warrior, a tank that can dash around the barrow, and kill dragon skulls with his powerful ax. Play as a Norse Wizard able to shoot a magical fireball, that can kill any cursed human skull. Work together to brawl your way through the barrow and defeat the cursed skulls that will try to stop you.

A controller is required to play this game. Viking uses the controller while the Wizard uses mouse and keyboard.

Created by 5 Man Band:

Cason Quisenberry, Cole Pittman, Ethan Laird, Mitchell Poche, and Ransom Linder.
